title: s6 towers?!
body:
Ok, am i the ONLY one feeling like the 0 armor and MR on towers is kinda annoying as hell??? Litterally every single game is just one of 2 things:

1: A lane wins lane and takes turret within the first 10 minutes then proceeds to run around the map 1 shotting every turret before the other team can react
2: A lane is even, then a jungler ganks at about level 5 and both the laners and jungler take tower in 10 seconds after they force the enemies laner to either back or kill them..

I've heard this is a bug and they are planning to have the towers ACTUALLY scale over time during the game and for gods sake PLEASE, i hope that is true. this is literally the first time I've felt like league isn't fun anymore.

replies.body: I actually cant stand it, i am ahead in lane by 3+ kills and 20+ minions, and I'm slowly pushing their turret, but each time i get a kill i am low enough that i have to recall and cant finish their turret, and then i get ganked and die and then my full health turret is suddenly gone! like wtf is the strategy in that? you work hard to be hard winning your lane and then 10 seconds later, no longer have any lane to win because you screwed up once and got ganked 2v1, how come the 3+ times they screwed up 1v1 don't count?

Legitmate question i want to ask, if your that far ahead, where are your wards?

And why can't you 2v1, what champs are you playing?

Usually in the bush, where most wards are, just because I see him coming doesn't always mean i can get away in time, especially with a nocturne or hecarim etc.

as for champs, this mostly happens when i play top lane (due to the abundance of AD champions) it doesnt happen so much with Azir and my other mains in mid, but it has happened recently with Quinn and Kha top. 
2v1ing a Riven and a Lee with kha isn't the easiest thing to do tbh and usually ends with a death on my part.
Ah so your warding in the "too late" bush.

sure?

from how you are talking im assuming you've never been ganked successfully then?
which confuses me as your icon is only gold and not challenger?

I've been ganked, given new trinkets it tends to be an inevitability, but fact is your shoving and your probably using the too late bush to do your warding.

There are so many additional ways to avoid ganks, Scuttle, Pinks, not using your gap closers as engages.

Like i'm legitmately not sure how you get ganked as a Kha'zix in top lane, your E gives you enough of a gap to juke a Lee Q.

Quinn there is some leeway as your E isn't really an escape.

Though both are really non-meta top laners especially given meta right now is Guinsoo's top laners (+Riven/Fiora).

And if you knew me you'd know that i rarely play ranked regardless, though have put it to myself that i want bear minimum Plat next season, and am going to try for diamond, so we will see then what happens i guess.

If it was impossible for Kha'zix to be ganked, he would be banned in every game that was ever played.
In theory, sure, he has a massive leap and 2/3 movespeed/invisibility buffs and 5 slows. which sounds un-killable in ganks..
but communism works in theory as well, but practice always tends to be a little different.

im afraid I've never been a slave to the meta, of my 12 or so main champion pool, only one of them is above 10% pick rate, and most of them are below 5% I'm not sure if this is an advantage or a disadvantage really, but i generally only play champs if they fit 3 criteria:

1. look good (particles included) 
2. fit my play style 
3. have strong character (e.g. Azir, gnar, TF, Kindred etc, that have either really unique character (Gnar) or strong lore/story (Azir) as opposed to Lee or WW that have virtually no story surrounding them and have ugly outdated models and particles)

i can understand that completely, I'm not much of a ranked person myself as well,
but i do wish you the best of luck getting to diamond :) I'm sure you'll do it! ^^

Considering Kha'zix is generally a jungler, he won't get banned simply because of ungankability.

And playing champs that have a low pick rate isn't bad, the main thing is knowing when to play them and where (for example, Quinn is more of a mid laner right now then top/ADC)

i guess so, but its like if AP ezreal was so powerful that he won every game, it doesnt matter that he is an ADC not a mage, he would still be banned.

True but i like playing her top, because people play darius or riven and expect to do well and get so mad because of how infuriating Quinn is, and even if we don't win its just beautiful seeing those people who play broken champs getting so mad because for once they aren't raping their lane opponent.
its just satisfying.

Ganks only really work if

1. They are far enough up the lane
2. The enemy laner has CC'd you
3. The enemy laner has baited you because they are low
4. You either have not warded, or you warded the "too late" bush.

If you have JUST WON a 1v1 and the enemy is dead, you should be recalling under tower as soon as you've shoved a bit of the lane, if you are recalling on 300 hp in the middle of your lane and you KNOW THE ENEMY JUNGLER IS SOMETHING LIKE A HECARIM OR NOCTURNE then you deserve to die. 

Alternatively, if you are chasing someone down their lane for the kill, and you get it, but end up being so low that they literally kill you two seconds after, that again is your fault, you should have assessed the risk and decided if the kill was worth the risk of dying, especially if you don't have eyes on the enemy jungler. Don't go fucking ham on a 1v1 if the enemy jungler is mia.

And maybe don't shit talk people about their rankings when you're using a level 9 forum account.

So im assuming you've never been ganked either then?

I'm surprised at how many people there are who have never died in a gank, jungling must be a very un-influential position then?

EDIT:
i admit that i have died in ganks for whatever reason (ikr i must be so bad to have died in a gank omg), and the point is not even that i get ganked, its that even if you are way ahead in lane and have a full hp turret, one successful gank can now lose your lane.

also congrats on the basics of recalling! its not even worth mentioning that you don't recall in the middle of a lane even if the jungler isn't nocturne or hecarim, everyone knows that, so i wouldn't be so proud of knowing it if i were you. As for chasing them down and risk analysis, obviously even with risk analysis things don't always go your way, (if they always did, id be there instead of faker holding the world cup, but they don't and so I'm here taking to you instead.)  you could underestimate their power or have unlucky minion block or have miscounted the seconds on their ultimate cooldown, or just blatantly miss an ability, it does happen now and then etc etc there are multiple factors. shutdown gold included in risk analysis.

as for shit talking, you have no idea what my rank is because I am using a forum account, so perhaps you shouldn't make statements so blindly. 

Also in no way does my rank come into account with what i said (so how is it even shit talking), i said it confused me that he was talking like he had never been ganked when his icon was only gold, because if he ALWAYS escaped every gank unscathed, i would hazard a guess that he would be ranked a lot higher than that, seeming that even the pro's get ganked occasionally.

so tell me where in that statement does my rank come into it? i am neither stating that i am better than him or disputing the fact that i die in ganks, so please enlighten me as to the point of your statement?

Weow what a strawman.

So im assuming you've never dodged a gank before, and ganking is an unstoppable force that cannot be avoided then?

Edit: If you get ganked once, the jungler and laner were smart, if you get ganked 3 times, and every time was successful, then you suck.

Of course it isn't an unstoppable force, and of course i have both died and got a double in ganks, but funnily enough it has killed people in the past, so i state my surpise that you are so immune to it.

also please show me where in my string of comments that i mentioned i was successfully ganked multiple times?
i only said i get ganked ONCE, and suddenly my lane is gone even though i was ahead.
so what was the point you were making?

Ah, I see

"but each time i get a kill i am low enough that i have to recall and cant finish their turret, and then i get ganked and die"

You were referencing these as separate instances, as you recall and both come back to lane on full health. The way it was phrased made me thing you killed your lane opponent, then when on 300 health, started to recall, and were killed by recalling. That does clear things up a little bit. 

And to your earlier post, I never complained about your rank, I just told you not to bitch out someone who is gold when you are using a forum account, and not showing anyone what your real account is, and its quite typical for people who are low ranking, for example bronze or low silver, to use a forum account on the forums, since they get flamed out by higher ranked players when they make balance suggestions. I literally said nothing about your own rank, I just said don't say something like "WHY AREN'T YOU CHALLENGER"

Its quite possible to know mechanics of something, and make a mistake or get greedy and die as a result, the person you responded to previously, as well as myself are guilty of this. It's also possible that we DO escape every single gank, as we know how to position, but perhaps we have really really terrible micro and just feed our lane opponents even when we don't get ganked.

But on a more serious note, it seems like you have serious anger issues, all the guy above did was explain gank avoidance to you, and you seem to have instantly taken it as an attack on your person, and respond with "WHY AREN'T YOU CHALLENGER THEN?"

That is not an adequate reply. It's you strawmanning an argument. I can know how to do something as much as I like, doesn't mean I can do it 100% of the time in practice.


Winning lane is also not dictated by the first tower, winning lane is dictated by whoever comes out stronger. Sure you may have lost your turret, but now you can still roam and take the turrets of other lanes.

Ah ok thats my bad then, sorry.

i use this account for a couple of reasons, 1 being i have spent a lot of money on skins and the fewer places you type your username and password in the less likely you are to be grabbed in a hacking event.
2 being i generally have quite in-depth discussions and would rather not be reported in game because i happened to get on someones bad side. 

anger is not present at all, i simply responded in a passive aggressive way to a passive aggressive comment. My first post was just strengthening the original poster's comment that towers are much weaker now and so games are more prone to snowballing nothing negative about that, which was then followed by a comment with the polished message of "you must suck at warding" "what? you cant 2v1 wow you suck" which were completely unnecessary, and by saying that implies that he is above all that, so i merely responded with a message of "why don't you practice what you preach"
if you read all my comments there is no anger at all, sure there may be snarky remarks and passive aggressive/sarcastic lines, and thats just because i have no patience for the "holier than thou" attitude or for people who pose emotional/irrational arguments without considering all the factors and evidence, and he pertained to the first of those criteria.

also its perfectly fine to know what to do but not be able to do it 100% of the time, but if you 'cant' do it 100% of the time then you have no grounds to diminish others for the same offence, by all means give them advice, but saying "why cant you 2v1?" has connotations of "i can, why cant you" and unless you can 2v1 100% of the time then you have no grounds, and you just are adding negative comments for no reason.

Also yes that is the case but i would rather roam with my tower than without it. it is never counterproductive to have one more tower than the enemy.
what goin on in is thread

Towers do scale over time ATM. It just doesn't start until 15 minutes for outer turrets and 30 minutes for inner turrets. Also it's not a bug, 100% intended. 

Riot is looking to fix this though, they have some turret health changes on PBE, but honestly it's not much, we're probably in for a second patch of snowball meta.
